page.title: 07My hobby in cannington
page.content: I own a home computer; it is called a ZX spectrum. I have had my computer for about two years and it is still one of the most popular home computers you can buy. The original ZX spectrum has 40 keys but I have had mine upgraded and now its got 58 keys. Infomation from the computer is usually stored on cassette but there are other methods which are a lot quicker.The ZX spectrum has lots of games that you can buy.The average price for a computer game is about Â£6.95. I have about 40 programes on cassette and about 30 games. Some of the games are not very good but some are excellent.
